form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. Department of Justice\nForm G-325A\nBiographic Information, OMB No. 1115-0066

full_text: INSTRUCTIONS: USE TYPEWRITER. BE SURE ALL COPIES ARE LEGIBLE. Failure to answer fully all questions delays action. Do Not Remove Carbons: If typewrite eno? available, print heavily in block letters with ball-point pen. *U.S.GPO:1995-392-808/20123 U.S. Department of Justice FORM G-325A OMB No. 1115-0066 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION (Family name) (First name) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE (Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY FILE NUMBER OMAR AHMED HASSAN FEMALE 01 01 1904 SOMALIAN A- 71 666 754 ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. NONE KISMANYO, SOMALIA (If any) 254 95 3482 FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME DATE, CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH (If known) CITY AND COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE FATHER OMAR HASSAN UNKNOWN, SOMALIA "DECEASED" MOTHER (Maiden name) NUR MUMINA UNKNOWN "DECEASED" HUSBAND (If none, so state) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH DATE OF MARRIAGE PLACE OF MARRIAGE OR (For wife, give maiden name) WIFE DANAN, UNKNOWN SOMALIA ABDI HAWEYO 01 01 30 SOMALIA FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES (if none, so state) FAMILY NAME (For wife, give maiden name) FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE DATE & PLACE OF MARRIAGE DATE AND PLACE OF TERMINATION OF MARRIAGE APPLICANT'S RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS. DECATUR RD #T17 DECATUR GA USA 01 96 PRESENT TIME DEREDAWA ETHIOPIA 03 91 01 96 APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR DEREDAWA ETHIOPIA 03 91 01 96 APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, SO STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATION (SPECIFY) MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR NONE PRESENT TIME Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DATE NATURALIZATION STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT OTHER (SPECIFY): 7/24/97 IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IS IN OTHER THAN ROMAN LETTERS, WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IN THIS SPACE: Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT.
